name: Oricorio

passive.name: Dancer
passive.effect: When your Active Pokemon (other than this Pokemon) uses an attack or passive with "Dance" in its name, this Pokemon may also use that attack or passive as if it were the Active Pokemon.

attacks.name: Passionate Dance
attacks.effect: You may discard a Fire Energy to deal 20 more damage. You may move a Lightning Energy to a Benched Pokemon to deal 20 more damage.

attacks.name: Hypnotizing Dance
attacks.effect: If this Pokemon has a Ghost Energy attached to it, you may put 2 Curses on top of the opponent's deck, then shuffle it. If this Pokemon has a Fairy Energy attached to it, you may heal 20 damage from one of your Benched Pokemon.

flavor: Their dancing form makes them great additions at parties. Children love them, and skilled dancers have been known to imitate their movements.
